comment_body: I was enthralled with this story, it really pulled me in! However, the styling of this sentence: "ThE HOuSe Fell Silent" seemed glaringly out of place.

I appreciate your feedback! First time I wrote a short story like this. My thought process behind that line was to combine both the italicized words and the normal font words to depict sort of the end of the fall in madness. But thank you again for enjoying it :)))
